sys_ux_client_script.name: Monitor Integration Status Value

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_82a41ea6475a0a508bb7bf99516d43cb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Jira Information SOW">beb68c2d47dac2508bb7bf99516d437e</macroponent><name>Monitor Integration Status Value</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {

    if (!event.payload) {
        return;
    }

    const fieldName = event.payload.fieldName;

    if (fieldName !== "u_jira_ebonding_status") {
        return;
    }

    // We only refresh the Glide Form if the integration status has changed
    // This will then help with the UI Action or buttons to function properly without having to refresh the entire page

    api.data.glide_current_form_record.reload();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucas.guerino@crossfuze.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-24 07:06:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>82a41ea6475a0a508bb7bf99516d43cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Monitor Integration Status Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Spoke" source="sn_jira_spoke">4fab4673db1893009a985404ce961942</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Spoke">4fab4673db1893009a985404ce961942</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_82a41ea6475a0a508bb7bf99516d43cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucas.guerino@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-24 09:48:34</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
